thread.title: Worst period of my career, says Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho

author: newsr.in
title: Worst period of my career, says Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho
text:
*London:* Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho says he is in the midst of the worst period of his trophy-laden career.
The Premier League champions have two wins from seven games this term and followed up last Saturday’s draw at Newcastle with a midweek Champions League loss at Porto.*Jose Mourinho. Pic/Getty Images*
“I define ... »
